thread.title: Donald Trump says media guilty of 'conspiracy theories and blind hatred' - but Fox and Friends is 'great'
thread.title_full: Donald Trump says media guilty of 'conspiracy theories and blind hatred' - but Fox and Friends is 'great'

author: Lizzie Dearden
title: Donald Trump says media guilty of 'conspiracy theories and blind hatred' - but Fox and Friends is 'great'
text:
47 GMT Click to followThe Independent US 
Donald Trump has accused the "fake news media" of publishing "conspiracy theories" in his latest attack on the press. 
"The fake news media is going crazy with their conspiracy theories and blind hatred. @MSNBC & @CNN are unwatchable. @foxandfriends is great!" the President wrote on Twitter. 
His remarks came as US news coverage was dominated by unconfirmed allegations members of Mr Trump's campaign team were in contact with Russian intelligence officials before the election. 
More to follow
